title: Pixel 3 XL camera crashes
content:
Google Pixel 3 XL
Front camera and flash cannon be used. Camera will not turn on with camera app or third party apps. Front camera works fine. Camera app crashes when launching. I have tried uninstalling updates and launching in safe mode.  I even went through and uninstalled every app that had camera permissions.  I have tried uninstalling the camera updates and clear app settings and cache. The app "Open Camera' Tell me something may using my front camera. I  rebooted the phone in safe mode following suggestions on here and it still didn't work.

I tried posting app version and android version but google seems to think that is personal identifying information; not sure why and will not allow me to post it.
